entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
